hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select e.id, e.name from multi_org_element e where e.type=:type <if isNotBlank( name )> and e.name like '%${name}%' </if> <if isNotBlank( excludeIds )> and e.id not in ( :excludeIds ) </if>
select e.* from multi_org_element e, multi_org_tree_node t where e.id = t.ele_id and t.org_version_id = :orgVersionId
